parameters.name: IncludeReservationData
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to include renewal data. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

parameters.name: IsOrKey
parameters.description:
The logical operator between the filter conditions. Valid values:

*   **false** (default): **AND** Bandwidth plans that meet all filter conditions are returned.
*   **true**: **OR** Bandwidth plans that meet one of the filter conditions are returned.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: **50**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description:
The information about the tags.

You can specify at most 20 tags in each call.
